titleStmt.title: A Saxon historie, of the admirable adventures of Clodoaldus and his three children. Translated out of French, by Sr. T.H.
titleStmt.author: N. C.
T.H., Sir (Thomas Hawkins), d. 1640.
Caussin, Nicolas, 1583-1651, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at the signe of the Tygers-head, in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The admirable adventures of Clodoaldus.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Tygers-head, in St. Pauls Church-yard
